comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Edward Everett McCall was the unsuccessful Democratic (Tammany) candidate for Mayor of New York, in the election of November, 1913. McCall may have voted at this storefront polling place, or one similar to it: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445882428/] Here he is, out on the sidewalk, in a tonier neighborhood: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4465089906/in/photostream/] There are ten photographs of McCall on Flickr, in the Bain/LOC series: www.flickr.com/search/?q=McCall&w=8623220@N02

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Here is the entry I started in Wikipedia from the last time he showed up: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Everett_McCall
